name: dataproject
description: Michaels App Idea (True Review...?): - Big Movie Database - Review is blurred, won't be un-blurred until you have seen the film for yourself and left your own review - Social Media-ish (Following Feed, what your friends are watching and friend recommendations) - Film Verification, validate that you did indeed watch the film so you are allowed to review the film based on your genuine, bias free, opinion. - Badge System - Movie Poster, date and time, photo attachment, secondary reviews after the hype - Snap Score type feature - Titles for certain events - Link to streaming services and a 'To be reviewed' queue.
